sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 597.0015 Definitions.—For purposes of this chapter, the following terms shall have the following meanings:

sections.heading: Legislative declaration of public policy respecting aquaculture.
sections.text: declaration of public policy respecting aquaculture.

sections.heading: Powers and duties of Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services.
sections.text: and duties of Department of Agriculture and Consumer Services.

sections.heading: Definitions. For purposes of this chapter, the following terms shall have the following meanings:(1)“Aquaculture” means the cultivation of aquatic organisms
sections.text: (2)“Aquaculture producers” means those persons engaging in the production of aquaculture products and certified under s. 597.004.(3)“Aquaculture products” m
